item.title: What needs to be installed
item.description: üëâ Reachy 2021/2023 is already fully compatible with the teleoperation application. You have nothing to install on the robot. ‚¨áÔ∏è Download the latest version of the app On the Oculus Quest 2 There are two options for this device: use it natively on the headset or run it on your computer using an Oculus link. If you want to use the Oculus Link, please refer to the On Windows computer section.
